@yankeedoodlepad You’re so right Karen. I’m glad to see a huge increase in the amount of well known people talking about their struggles with mental health. Unfortunately though in Ireland there aren’t enough free services available for people when they do want to seek treatment.

@VioletAshes Maybe a reason people don’t speak out about their mental health problems is that they’re afraid it’ll be used against them in the future. E.g. If they spoke online about their issues they might worry that a future employer could find that out & it would put them off hiring them.
